div.p: Imagine what you could do here. At Apple, great ideas have a way of becoming great products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish.The algorithm engineer will work in a dynamic R&D oriented team developing and implementing methods for automatic enhancement, equalization and color balancing of very large scale imagery.

ul.li: To succeed within this role, you should have strong expertise and experience within the following areas:

div.p:
